name: Lights Out (itch) (KeyGames)
description:
This Game is Under Development (This is a sample made in 8 hours)

Story(Not in this release) - you're a lost adventurer searching for treasures

Inputs - Keyboard, Dualshock 4(Not in this release)

Controls Keyboard

Flashlight - Z
Run - X
Escape - Pause

DS4

Flashlight - Cross
Run - R2

Escape Options
